content:
Hey all - Based on the FHIR subgroup call today, I logged the following tracker JIRA to request changes to the Genomics Guidance page in FHIR core:
https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-27159
In short, the feedback on the call is that the current content is too focused on the MolecularSequence resource. Welcome feedback here and/or on the JIRA.
